channel.title: Rogier van der Weyden on Artangled
channel.description: Recent content in Rogier van der Weyden on Artangled

item.title: Interlude - Rogier van der Weyden at the Alte Pinakothek
item.description: The purpose of this site is for me to write about an art show I’ve seen each week. Obviously, that’s a purpose that can’t be fulfilled at the moment, with galleries - and gallery-goers - in lockdown. Time for something different then: from home, I’m going to focus each post on a work in a permanent collection, shuttered somewhere in an empty museum, that I’ve been thinking about for some reason.
